title: sa_lakṣmīṇkarā-advayasiddhi
body:
advayasiddhi yoginī lakṣmīṅkarā viracitā

oṃ namaḥ śrīvajrasattvāya

prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ nāthaṃ sarvajñaṃ tribhavodbhavam / praṇamya śirasā vajram īpsitārthaphalapradam // deśakālatithivāranakṣatrair maṇḍalair vinā / vakṣye haṃ vajrasattvasya saṃkṣepāt sādhanaṃ param // niyamavratopavāsair akṣaroccāraṇabhāvanaiḥ / atattvayogoatattvayogī na siddhyet kalpakoṭiśatair api // viḍvajrodakabījādyair nāsikābhyantarodbhavaiḥ / pūjayed satataṃ mantrī ātmānaṃ tattvabhāvanaiḥ // jananīṃ bhaginīś caiva duhitṛbhāgineyikān / prajñnopāyavidhānena pūjayed yogavit sadā // ekāṅgavikalāṃ hīnāṃ śilpanīṃ śvapacīṃ tathā / yoṣitāṃ pūjayen nityaṃ jñānavajraprabhāvanaiḥ //

tatremāni bījapadāni – oṁṃ āḥ hūṁṃ

yena yena hi baddhyante jantavo raudrakarmaṇā / sopāyena tu tenaiva mucyante bhavabandhanāt // samayān aharahaḥ kuryād divyān pañcakulodbhavān / pūjayec ca pradīpādyaiḥ sakṣīrair viśvasambhavaiḥ // protphullanayano mantrī nityaṃ prahasitānanaḥ / cittam āropya saṃbodhau bhāvayej jñānasāgaram // yāvat sthiracalā bhāvā santy atra tribhavālaye / sarve te tattvayogena draṣṭavyā vajradhṛg yathā // paravādinaś ca kecil lingabhedair vyavastitāḥ / te 'py atra nāvamantavyā vajrasattvavikurvitaiḥ // sarvān samarasīkrtya bhāvān nairātmyaniḥsṛtān / bhāvayet satataṃ mantrī dehaṃ prakṛtinirmalam // gandhamālyādibhir vastrair dhūpanaivedyakais tathā / gītavādyais tathā nṛtyaiḥ sopāyair bhajate vibhuḥ // na kaṣṭakalpanāṃ kuryān nopavāsaṃ na ca kriyām / snānaṃ śaucaṃ na caivātra grāmadharmavivarjanaṃ // na cāpi vandayed devān kāṣṭhapāṣāṇamṛṇmayān / pūjām asyaiva kāyasya kurvān nityaṃ smāhitaḥ // makṣikācchardisaṃmiśrair viṇmūtrādyaiś ca bhāvitaiḥ / pañcapradīpasaṃyuktaiḥ pūjayed vajradhāriṇam // abalā svayambhukusumaiḥ sakṣīrair viśvasambhavaiḥ / pūjayed devatāṃ tena dehasthāṃ tattvabhāvanaiḥ // parasvaharaṇaṃ kuryāt paradāraniṣevanam / vaktavyaṃ ca mṛṣāvākyaṃ sarvabuddhāṃś ca ghātayet // śailamṛṇmayacaityādīn na kuryāt pustake ratim / na maṇḍalāni svapne 'pi kāyavākcittakarmaṇā // jugupsāṃ naiva kurvīta sarvavastuṣu mantravit / vajrasattvaḥ svayaṃ tatra sākṣād rūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ // gamyāgamyavikalpaṃ tu bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ tathaiva ca / peyāpeyaṃ tathā mantrī kuryān naiva samāhitaḥ // vairocanasamudbhūtān sarvaprāṇyaṅgasambhavān / prāṇakān guhyatattvajño bhakṣayet siddhihetunā // sarvavarṇasamudbhūtā jugupsyā naiva yoṣitaḥ / saiva bhagavatī prajñā saṃvṛtyā rūpam āśrityā // na tithir na ca nakṣatraṃ nopavāso vidhīyate / advayajñānayuktasya siddhir bhavati saugatī // bahunātra kim uktena yad bhaved upalabdhikam / tat sarvaṃ tattvayogena draṣṭavyaṃ tattvavedinā // hastyaśvakharagāvoṣṭrapradīpaṃ śvānasambhavam / mahāpradīpasaṃmiśraṃ bhakṣayed yogavit sadā // na cādhyāsaktiṃ kurvīta ekasminn api yogavit / samatācittayogena bhāvanīyo bhavārṇavaḥ // utpattisthitinirodhaṃ cāsampṛktaṃ pṛthagjanaiḥ / tasya bhāve tu saṃsāro nānyatra pralayodbhavaḥ // dinaṃ tu bhagavān vajrī naktaṃ prajñā vidhīyate / evaṃ tu bhāvayed yogī laghu siddhim avāpnuyāt // yat tad avyaktarūpaṃ tu sarvasattveṣu saṃsthitam / guruvaktrāt paraṃ tattvaṃ prāpyate nātra samśayaḥ // apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ nirnimittaṃ nirālayam / vyāpakaṃ sarvasattveṣu saṃbodhiḥ paramaṃ padam // evaṃ matvā tu vai yogī yo 'bhyased buddhimān sadā / sa siddhyati na sandeho mandapuṇyo 'pi mānavaḥ // ācāryāt parataraṃ nāsti trailokye sacarācare / yasya prasādāt prāpyante siddhayo 'nekadhā budhaiḥ // vajrasattvaḥ sa vai jñeyaḥ sarvabuddhair namaskṛtaḥ / ācāryaḥ paramo devaḥ pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ // sa eva tathatārūpī lokānugrahahetunā / rūpam āśritya saṃvṛtyā saṃsthito yogapīṭhake // mṛtyur eṣa vikalpo yaṃ na bhāvaḥ sarvavastuṣu / hanyate svavikalpena pṛthagjanavijṛmbhitaiḥ //

śrīmadoḍīyānavinirgatā mahāyogapīṭhāgatā 'khilayogatantratattvagarbhā śrīlakṣmīmukhakamalād viniḥsṛtā svādhiṣṭhānakramodayā advayasiddhir nāma sādhanopāyikā samāpteti
